import './AddRecipes.css' import React from "react" const AddRecipes = (props) => { const nameRecipesRef = React.useRef(); const servingRef = React.useRef(); const imageUrlRef = React.useRef(); const newRecipeRef = (event) => { console.log("hola") props.setNewRecipe({ ...props.newRecipe, "name": nameRecipesRef.current.value, "serving": servingRef.current.value, "imageUrl": imageUrlRef.current.value }) console.log(props.newRecipe) props.addRecipes(event) } return (
